name: Wilfred
description:
Wilfred is a gameboy emulator, pixel art story. Our goal was to bring new life to the gameboy style of  games by mixing old and new elements of gaming in the classic format. Experience the tragic downfall of a man as his world falls apart around him into utter chaos. Detailed pixel art, portraits and glitching all add to the dramatic atmosphere and gameplay. 

Dear Roy Harlow,

          brother if you are reading this I hope that you are well. Mother misses you dearly and grieves both you and fathers absence. Please return home soon and safe; I do not know what I would do if you or father came to any harm. We have fallen upon tough times here, although not as difficult as you have it, of that I am sure. Rations have become stricter than ever. Mother said that when she is able to get sugar again she would bake you your favorite, chocolate cake with cream filling. So, please come home soon we are both waiting.

With love,

            Wilfred Harlow.                                                                                                                                                                                                                 P.S I know mother will come around when                                                she sees your medals. I bet they will be even                                              better than fathers.

Dear Fredrick Harlow,

          father I have some urgent news to tell you when you return. Please come home safe. I must keep this brief in fear of running out of ink and paper. Mother and I eagerly await your return. 

With love,

               Wilfred Harlow.                                                                                                                                                                                                            P.S Have you run into anyone that you know                                                       recently? I am just wondering.
